page.title: 09RECREATION-PLAYING PLACE/KEA
page.content: The major housing development in our area is Playing Place, with other small villages close by.Most of the facilities for{recreation}are in Playing Place.These include,a{tennis {court},a{skate board rink},a{playing {field}and a{snooker hall}.In Carnon Downs there is a{bowling green}. Many people enjoy{walking,jogging}or {sailing}in the creek.Younger people play team games like{football}and {rugby.}To{swim,}people travel to the Truro swimming baths. { }To many people{gardening}is a hobby. My grandad grows vegetables like beans,sweetcorn & potatoes.Herbs are now popular again.We grow thyme,mint,& feverfew to use in cooking and as medicine.Flowers are grown too and my next door neighbour keeps bees for honey.Each year there is a garden produce competition in the local hall.
